name: agent
description: Server agent to be controlled by the manager

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:win" "npm run build:linux" "npm run build:mac"
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && npm run build:js && pkg dist/index.js --config package.json --targets node18-win-x64
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && npm run build:js && pkg dist/index.js --config package.json --targets node18-linux-x64
scripts.build:mac: npm run clean && npm run build:js && pkg dist/index.js --config package.json --targets node18-macos-x64
